subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Dallas Cowboys have hired Reggie Herring as linebackers coach. The hiring comes a little more than a month after Herring, the former Arkansas interim coach, was named the defensive coordinator at Texas A&M. Herring filled the last of the positions that opened in Dallas after Tony Sparano became the Dolphins’ new coach and hired three Cowboys assistants for his staff.
